foodItems.name: Phosphorescent Mushroom Capsules
foodItems.description: Capsules filled with glowing and hallucinogenic mushrooms

foodItems.name: Spectral Lotus Seeds
foodItems.description: Seeds that shimmer and emit a faint glow

foodItems.name: Sulfuric Oyster Sauce
foodItems.description: Savory and pungent sauce made from sulfuric oysters

foodItems.name: Twilight Bark Extract
foodItems.description: A bitter and smoky drink made from the bark of twilight trees

foodItems.name: Venomous Flower Petals
foodItems.description: Petals that are venomous and have a numbing effect

foodItems.name: Volatile Jelly Cubes
foodItems.description: Jelly cubes that release a burst of vapor when bitten into

foodItems.name: Winged Fruit Husks
foodItems.description: Husks that contain winged and juicy fruits

foodItems.name: Xenon Infused Broth
foodItems.description: A savory broth infused with xenon gas

foodItems.name: Yggdrasil Bark Topping
foodItems.description: A crispy and flavorful topping made from the bark of the mythical Yggdrasil tree

foodItems.name: Zircon Encrusted Noodles
foodItems.description: Noodles covered in a layer of zircon crystals

drinkItems.name: Ambergris Absinthe
drinkItems.description: An absinthe made with ambergris, a rare substance found in the digestive system of whales

drinkItems.name: The nightly Yamazaki
drinkItems.description: A Whiskey infused with the boredom of all Daily Yamasaki employees who worked the nightshift in November 1987

drinkItems.name: Ganymedean Ghost Gin
drinkItems.description: A sophisticated gin made with the light of a ghostly gas lamp that is said to still wander the deserts of the seventh moon of Jupiter.

drinkItems.name: Discordant Leaf Liqueur
drinkItems.description: A sweet liqueur made from disharmonized stone mill leaves, producing a unique and imbalanced flavor profile that tingles the ear.

drinkItems.name: The wasted coffee
drinkItems.description: A coffee liquor made from coffee that was roasted and brewed just so perfectly that it was a shame to make liquor from it. Tastes like regular coffee.

drinkItems.name: Empty Room Soju
drinkItems.description: Infused with the unsettling feeling that you get when you walk down a large corridor alone

drinkItems.name: Scarecrow Wine
drinkItems.description: Allegedly brewed by scarecrows, but only at the end of autumn. Tastes like hay.

drinkItems.name: Piedro's Raisin Liquor
drinkItems.description: Brewed by a man named Piedro. He sometimes steals swings from nearby playgrounds.

drinkItems.name: Toilet wine
drinkItems.description: Prisoners brewed this in their toilets...an acquired taste...
